attributes.action: Increase funding to the Lincolnshire Police Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lincolnshire is the second largest county in the country but has the lowest government funding by £11,000,000. This has caused a shortfall in this year's (2007) budget of £7,000,000. This county has hundreds of towns and villages scattered all over and needs quality policing. Not increasing funding will mean a large council tax increase and a large cut to the police service.
